operation.name: update
operation.sql: UPDATE USER_INFO SET USERNAME = #username# , PASSWORD = #password# , BIRTH_DATE = #birthDate# , SEX = #sex# , AGE = #age# WHERE USER_ID = #userId#

operation.name: getById
operation.sql:
SELECT USER_ID ,USERNAME ,PASSWORD ,BIRTH_DATE ,SEX ,AGE
FROM USER_INFO WHERE USER_ID = #userId#

select r.role_id,sum(r.user_id) sum_user_id from role r
UNION select r.role_id,sum(r.user_id) sum_user_id from role r
UNION ALL select r.role_id,sum(r.user_id) sum_user_id from role r

group by r.role_id
